Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 4 Saññojanagocchaka » 4.1 Saññojanaduka » 4.1.7 Pañhāvāra » 4.1.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 4.1.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Kammādi
Saññojanagocchaka
Saññojanaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Kammādi
27.
1386Nosaññojano dhammo nosaññojanassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi…  vipākapaccayena paccayo…  ekaṃ…  āhārapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi…  indriyapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi…  jhānapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi…  maggapaccayena paccayo…  nava…  sampayuttapaccayena paccayo…  nava.
<< Āsevanaup Vippayutta >>
